inputs.name: Nmap Scan Interval
inputs.help_text: Specify the interval (in minutes) for Nmap scans.

inputs.name: Target IP Range
inputs.help_text: Enter the IP range to be scanned by Nmap.

inputs.name: Enable Nmap Collector
inputs.help_text: Enable or disable the Nmap Collector.

actions.description: Initiates an immediate Nmap scan for the configured IP range.

constraints.description: The Target IP Range must be in a valid CIDR format (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24).
The Nmap Scan Interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.

errors.description: The entered IP range is not valid. Please use a valid CIDR format.
The scan interval must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.

steps: Navigate to Settings > Collectors > Nmap Collector.
Enable the Nmap Collector using the checkbox.
Specify the Target IP Range in CIDR format.
Set the Nmap Scan Interval (in minutes).
Click Save to apply the configuration.
Navigate to Settings > Collectors > Nmap Collector.
Click Start Scan to initiate an immediate scan.
Monitor scan progress in the Profiler UI.

image_insights.insights: The screenshot shows the Nmap Collector configuration screen with fields for enabling the collector, specifying IP range, and setting scan intervals.
